column1: 11:00|"eleven AM"|"The money comes in a torrent
column11: and Lifetime; from Siskel and Ebert
column13: and Monday Night Football; from nine TV stations
column15: and ten FM radio stations; from home videos
column19: and seven daily newspapers; from the theme parks in Orlando
column24: and merchandise; from baseball and hockey franchises; from hotels
column29: and soon even a cruise line."|"Team Rodent"|"Carl Hiaasen"

column1: ap 01:15|"one hour and 15 minutes"|"As for the sting operation
column2: in which the company used its own video camera
column3: the dancers charged that on January 8
column5: Disney security allowed the suspect “to remain in this hidden place
column7: observing and videotaping the female Kids of the Kingdom cast in states of partial or total nudity for over one hour and 15 minutes and did not apprehend [him] until the female performers left for their 11 o’clock performance.”"|"Team Rodent"|"Carl Hiaasen"
